target.name: all
target.command: @echo " Everything is up to date. Type '$(MAKE) test' to run test suite."
target.actual_command: @echo " Everything is up to date. Type 'make -w --debug=v --debug=m -p test' to run test suite."

target.name: t284_perl
target.actual_command: cc -o perl$(PERL_SUFFIX) $(PERL_PROFILE_LDFLAGS) -L/usr/local/lib -Wl,-E perlmain.o lib/auto/DynaLoader/DynaLoader.a libperl.a `cat ext.libs` -lnsl -ldl -lm -lcrypt -lutil -lc

target.name: t371_a2p
target.actual_command: cc -o a2p -L/usr/local/lib hash.o $(mallocobj) str.o util.o walk.o a2p.o -lnsl -ldl -lm -lcrypt -lutil -lc

target.name: t263_extra_pods
target.command: -@for x in `grep -l '^=[a-z]' README.* | grep -v README.vms` ; do \
-@test -f vms/perlvms.pod && cd pod && $(LNS) ../vms/perlvms.pod perlvms.pod && cd .. && echo "pod/perlvms.pod" >> extra.pods
-@test -f pod/perl588delta.pod && cd pod && $(LNS) perl588delta.pod perldelta.pod && cd .. && echo "pod/perldelta.pod" >> extra.pods # See buildtoc
target.actual_command: -@for x in `grep -l '^=[a-z]' README.* | grep -v README.vms` ; do \
-@test -f vms/perlvms.pod && cd pod && /bin/ln -s ../vms/perlvms.pod perlvms.pod && cd .. && echo "pod/perlvms.pod" >> extra.pods
-@test -f pod/perl588delta.pod && cd pod && /bin/ln -s perl588delta.pod perldelta.pod && cd .. && echo "pod/perldelta.pod" >> extra.pods # See buildtoc
